artist: Artist: Ducky DooLittle; Publisher: Night & Day Productions, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Perfect bound volume reinforced with black tape, letterpress text and photomechanical illustration of a vial of poison printed in offset lithography on pink wove paper covers; 96 pp.
title: Dr. Ducky DooLittle's Scientifically Sanctioned STRIP Flip Book
